akn:section.akn:heading: Use of reports, documents, and records

akn:content.akn:p:
§ 3103. Use of reports, documents, and records The Secretary may rely, as evidence of compliance with this subtitle, on—(1) reports, documents, and records of other persons who have been determined by the Secretary to be reliable; and
(2) other methods the Secretary has determined to be reliable.
(Added Pub. L. 104–324, title VI, § 603(a), Oct. 19, 1996, 110 Stat. 3930.)
